title: Markdown Maker
description: Convert any web page into clean, AI-ready markdown format. Perfect for feeding content to AI models, creating documentation, or archiving web content.

url.title: URL of a web page
url.description: The URL of the web page to convert to markdown

maxItems.title: Maximum Number of Pages to Process
maxItems.description: Maximum number of pages to process (optional)

delayBetweenRequests.title: Delay Between Requests
delayBetweenRequests.description: Number of seconds to wait between processing each URL. Useful to prevent server overload or avoid rate limiting. Leave empty or set to 0 for no delay (default).
